title: A Verified Mess: Turmoil From Twitter to FTX
description: Plus: Is the latest round of tech layoffs a sign of impending doom, or a much-needed structural correction?
dc:creator: Kevin Roose, Casey Newton, Davis Land, Paula Szuchman, Corey Schreppel, Dan Powell, Marion Lozano and Elisheba Ittoop
